params.name: data
params.description: Optional. Data for populating the Message object.

params.name: data.name
params.description: Required. Redis instance resource name using the form: projects/{project_id}/locations/{location_id}/instances/{instance_id} where location_id refers to a GCP region.

params.name: data.data_protection_mode
params.description: Optional. Available data protection modes that the user can choose. If it's unspecified, data protection mode will be LIMITED_DATA_LOSS by default.
